questions_and_notes: This is summed over all layers, so a new standard_name is needed here:  soil_liquid_water_content (like the existing soil_frozen_water_content).  This name has been approved 11/30/23.  Also, check that only 2 of following 3 water contents are requested: frozen, liquid, frozen+liquid.   Also see https://github.com/WCRP-CORDEX/cordex-cmip6-data-request/issues/2 .
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
comment: The mass (summed over all all layers) of liquid water.
